item.title: EP 57 - The Legend Of Aki
item.itunes:title: The Legend Of Aki
item.description:
Today we take we party with Ted Bundy's ghost then travel to England to get our muscles squeezed by a stalking psychopath.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Ted Bundy was an infamous serial killer who has a body count of over 30 young women. So when his ghost has been sighted everywhere from the execution chamber to a party house in Washington State, should we be worried that this killer is still on the prowl?

Then we got to jolly ole England to study the legend of Aki. This 6ft 5in, 310 lbs. body builder roams the streets asking to squeeze the muscles of young, fit men. Is he a harmless local or is there something more sinister going on?

Links:

Ted Bundy's Ghost

https://www.psychologytoday.com/us/blog/shadow-boxing/201210/ted-bundys-ghost

Student’s agree: serial killer Ted Bundy’s ghost is “super friendly”

http://trail.pugetsound.edu/?p=4462

Ghosts are allegedly haunting Ted Bundy’s childhood home

https://nypost.com/2017/05/09/contractor-ghosts-are-haunting-ted-bundys-childhood-home/

The Man Who Squeezes Muscles

https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/resources/idt-6d083913-0bfb-4988-8cd8-d126fa6dcff1

Purple Aki

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Akinwale_Arobieke

IMHO: Should we laugh at urban legend Purple Aki –the man who squeezes muscles?

https://www.bbc.co.uk/bbcthree/article/9e756e96-30e8-4822-9e69-ff8271f689b6

Muscle obsessed pervert dubbed 'Purple Aki' who was barred for ten years from grabbing men's biceps has the ban LIFTED after vowing to 'reinvent himself'

http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-3576790/Muscle-obsessed-pervert-dubbed-Purple-Aki-barred-ten-years-grabbing-men-s-biceps-ban-LIFTED-vowing-reinvent-himself.html

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2020
